Convert to a Resampling

Source: R/as_resampling.R
as_resampling.Rd

Convert object to a Resampling or a list of Resampling. This method e.g. allows to convert an mlr3oml::OMLTask to a Resampling.

Usage

as_resampling(x, ...)

# S3 method for class 'Resampling'
as_resampling(x, clone = FALSE, ...)

as_resamplings(x, ...)

# Default S3 method
as_resamplings(x, ...)

# S3 method for class 'list'
as_resamplings(x, ...)

Arguments

x

(any)
Object to convert.

...

(any)
Additional arguments.

clone

(logical(1))
If TRUE, ensures that the returned object is not the same as the input x.

On this page
